title: Never got PBE
body:
**So recently Riot Games posted "Thank You, Alpha Testers! Sign-Ups Now Closed" And at the end of the article it says "weâ€™ve turned off alpha signups and granted access to *everyone* who has already signed up." I Signed up sometime in October and never got access to it, did I not understand it right? I should get access in my gmail, but never got a email. If you know the solution of this problem or I just misunderstood this then comment down below, thanks! **     


_I MAIN HEC MWAHAHA {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:6}} _

replies.body: So Alpha Client is just Ui update?

We had some initial issues with granting everyone Alpha Client access for those who had signed up. Note that the Alpha Client is **not** the Public Beta Environment (PBE), as they are two **separate systems entirely**. 

As of [this post update](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/EHKLUm8A-terribly-transparent-update-on-client-alpha-acceptance-problems) we've resolved the initial issue and granted everyone who had signed up, Alpha Client access. Let me know if you have any questions.
